channel.title: Auth0 on Joost Plattel
channel.description: Recent content in Auth0 on Joost Plattel

item.title: Huub
item.description: Working with the team from Huub I’ve setup the authentication & authorization stack with Auth0. I’ve also worked on improving endpoints and websocket handling. As well es setting up architecture for multi-tenancy within Auth0 and the FastAPI stack.
